R

receiveAudio(ByteBuffer) - Method in class com.backyardbrains.audio.AudioService
Get a copy of the necessary activity, and push the received data out to said activity
receiveAudio(ByteBuffer) - Method in interface com.backyardbrains.audio.RecievesAudio
Called by a thread to pass audio ByteBuffer into a service.
RecievesAudio - Interface in com.backyardbrains.audio
A simple interface to attach to services which allows a callback into android's built-in classes from an unrelated thread
requestStop() - Method in class com.backyardbrains.audio.MicListener
clean up AudioRecord resource before exiting thread.
requestStop() - Method in class com.backyardbrains.drawing.OscilliscopeGLThread
Properly clean up GL stuff when exiting
run() - Method in class com.backyardbrains.audio.MicListener
Get a new recorder, check to see that we can actually record, start recording, and then continuously read audio from the recording interface, while pushing it out to the receiving service that implements RecievesAudio (set in MicListener.start(RecievesAudio).
run() - Method in class com.backyardbrains.drawing.OscilliscopeGLThread
Initialize GL bits, set up the GL area so that we're lookin at it properly, create a new BybGLDrawable, then commence drawing on it like the dickens.
running - Variable in class com.backyardbrains.audio.AudioService
Indicator of whether the service is properly running
